```{r}
library(sjPlot)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggfortify)
library(gtsummary)

final <- read_csv("data/places_svi_and_fluoride_06112024.csv")

county_geo <- tigris::counties(cb = T, year = 2020, progress_bar = FALSE) |> 
  tigris::shift_geometry() |>
  filter(STUSPS %in% state.abb) |>
  select(GEOID, geometry)
```
